title: The history of the rites, customes, and manner of life, of the present Jews, throughout the world. VVritten in Italian, by Leo Modena, a rabbine of Venice. Translated into English, by Edmund Chilmead, Mr. of Arts, and chaplain of Christ-Church Oxon
author: Modena, Leone, 1571-1648.
publisher: printed for Jo: Martin, and Jo: Ridley, at the Castle in Fleet-street, by Ram-Alley,
notes: An English translation, by Edmund Chilmead, of: Modena, Leone.  Historia de' riti hebraici, vita ed osservanze de gl'Hebrei di questi tempi.
Running title reads: The history of the present Jews throughout the world.
Reproduction of the original in the Cashel, Cathedral Library.
